snippet: With their simple geometric shapes and quirky details, the small works in “Anonymous Tantra Paintings” at Feature Inc. are not intended foremost as art but as aids to meditation rituals.
abstract: Roberta Smith reviews the exhibition Anonymous Tantra Paintings at Feature Inc gallery.
lead_paragraph: With their simple geometric shapes and quirky details, the small works in “Anonymous Tantra Paintings” at Feature Inc. are not intended foremost as art but as aids to meditation rituals.
